title: Srabble.iso
description:
Scrabble - CD-ROM Crossword Game

Harsbro Interactive Ã‚Â©1999 - Product ID: 99182

Win95/98 - (Works fine with XP.)

This is an older version which I haven&#039;t been able to find represented in torrent form anywhere.  I like the layout and simplicity of this older version over that of the newer more memory and cpu intensive incarnations.  And besides, it&#039;s f***ing Scrabble.  Why would I need bird&#039;s-eye-view, high def, CG camera pans inbetween moves?  The cool backgrounds and porno music is enough for me.

NOTE:  432 errors are known to occur during installation with XP.  Disable all anti-virus software and/or install in safe-mode if this occurs.  Once executed for the first time, the program may also stall at an all black start-up screen while Windows firewall asks permission to unblock the program.  If this occurs, alt-tab out of the game, click accept on the window prompts and return to the Scrabble window.  Post here with any other problems.
